name: 0rder - Up!
description:
Being a cashier in the most popular bakery in town sounds great, but stressful. Take orders as fast as you can before the bakery closes!

Controls: Mouse click. Just clicking, seriously.

Team Members:

- mahyellaw(programming, design)

- Haru Doma(lead design)

Credits for some assets used:    

Music Sources: freesound.org

Little Happy Tune(in-game track) by cabled_mess

Gamestep Bass by clinthammer.

Post-Jam stuff:

The prototype with the finished mechanics were done within the jam timeframe, we just added the visuals so it got VERY late. It turnd out quite good tho. :D

Any feedbacks in the comments or ratings are greatly appreciated 🧡
